title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI wrapper around Ollama written in Go for terminal power users.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions Copilot-style.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API with idiomatic Ruby objects.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client for Ollama with async/await support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for Ollama targeting macOS/iOS apps.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes additional REST endpoints on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that talks to a local Ollama instance.
